mapper.insert: insert into api_log ( project_id, execut_strategy_id, test_case_id, api_request_id, msg, status, time, is_available, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{projectId}, #{executStrategyId}, #{testCaseId}, #{apiRequestId}, #{msg}, #{status}, #{time}, #{isAvailable}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )

insert into api_log ( project_id, execut_strategy_id, test_case_id, api_request_id, msg, status, time, is_available, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) values
( #{obj.projectId}, #{obj.executStrategyId}, #{obj.testCaseId}, #{obj.apiRequestId}, #{obj.msg}, #{obj.status}, #{obj.time}, #{obj.isAvailable}, #{obj.isDeleted}, #{obj.createTime}, #{obj.updateTime} )
mapper.update:
update api_log
project_id = #{projectId},
execut_strategy_id = #{executStrategyId},
test_case_id = #{testCaseId},
api_request_id = #{apiRequestId},
msg = #{msg},
status = #{status},
time = #{time},
is_available = #{isAvailable},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
update api_log set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{value}
